name: blockchain-credential-portal
description: Blockchain-Verified Digital Credential & Career Tracking Portal for DREESMNHS

scripts.install-all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install && cd ../contracts && npm install
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend && npm run dev" "cd frontend && npm start"
scripts.build: cd backend && npm run build && cd ../frontend && npm run build
scripts.test: cd backend && npm test && cd ../contracts && npm test
scripts.deploy:contract: cd contracts && npx hardhat run scripts/deploy.js --network sepolia
